* Diana braced herself with her eyes locked on the huge mondter heading
towards them.
This was a nightmare!
She didn't even notice when Rion took out his sword and then began to run 
second later, frozen until she saw the blurr that was her friend and 
whimpered before starting after him.*

" Rion! Wait for me!!!"

* She was so scared that her eyes were wet and tears nearly ran down her 
fluffy cheeks. She didn't want to be left behind with nothing behind her but 
a monster that was all teeth!
Diana ran as quickly as she could and with all four legs it didn't take her 
long to catch up to Rion, nearly crying by the time she did so.
She kept her eyes on the trees ahead, seeing how slowly they got closer and 
sure that the beats was going to get them.
She wanted her mommy!*

" Get on!"

* She mannaged to get out, which was a surprise.
By running Rions speed she was keeping back from gouing faster then she
wished she could go, but with him on her back she could run faster and try 
to get to the trees.
She just hoped that they could hide in there, but they were pretty far apart 
from eachother...plenty of room for passing monsters!*
